verbs.description: [ARG0: Jordan McLinn , a 9-year - old boy with muscular dystrophy ,] [V: got] [ARG1: a big hug] [ARG2: from President Donald Trump] [ARGM-LOC: at a bill signing] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] .
Jordan McLinn , a 9-year - old boy with muscular dystrophy , got a big hug from President Donald Trump at a [ARG1: bill] [V: signing] on Wednesday .
